comments.text: So many nasty looking budget tablets out there but this is where the real stuff starts. Seriously considering one. The 3G stick option is good too.﻿
comments.author: Robbaddoo

comments.text:
i was going to the store to pick up the a200, but it was VERY laggy with ICS on it. almost crippling lag. so i went with the G9 Turbo instead.﻿ The processor is faster and it is cheaper.
i would go to a store and try both of them out.

comments.author: mieke telkamp

comments.text: the screen on the a200 is better, the battery life is about the same, the Archos has a faster processor, the Acer is less "buggy". you can find the Archos for $275 on sale at times, the Acer is $329 i think. You cant go wrong with either. I went with the Archos and I dont regret﻿ it.

Its an Equal Choice But This Is More Of An Cheaper Price $208 + 11.25 S&H and the a200 is $300 so now make your choice A200 Tegra 3 - Dual Core
Archos 101 G9 Turbo - Dual Core 1.5 GHz 

If you want a budget tablet choose Archos. But if you want something that﻿ is more of a high end tablet buy the a200.
